UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Decanoic acid modification enhances the antibacterial activity of PMAP-23RI-Dec
Literature.Author: Shen T, Chen L, Liu Y, Shi S, Liu Z, Cai K, Liao C, Wang C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:<4% Hemolysis=1280 µg/ml,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:<20% Killing=1280 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=0.0078µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes CICC 21634(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium SL1344(MIC=0.125µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa GIM1.551(MIC=0.5µg/ml)
